column5: I have some tech questions about this unit. Wondering if anyone out their has one. Tech support is closed so thought I'd try you guys. I bought this unit @ bass pro in Michigan bout 2 weeks ago. Finally getting some time to play with it. My problem is that I have no info on the map screen for Canada,no cities,no roads nadda. USA side of map is fine with all info that suppose to be there.(unimap). Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. John
Unimap doesn't cover Canada..  Says right on the Humminbird site.
